## Tool used and why

ChatGPT Codex

### How it helped me in this assignment

- Improving content for my website
- Give me ideas on what to write


### Benefits I noticed

- GenAI has a large amount of knowledge on the subject matter
- Makes it easier to brainstorm content

### Challenges I faced

- GenAI may not fully understand the context
- Make people lazy to read and understand code

### How I might use GenAI in future study or work

I might use GenAI in the future for brainstorming and creating frontend designs for websites.
